name.description: The name of the field defined by user and displayed back to user

minResult.description: The minimum number of results for AI to generate. If the AI cannot generate enough results it can return less, but otherwise should match

maxResult.description: The maximum number of results for AI to generate. AI should never generate more than this number of results.

promptParameterDefinitions.description: A list of all the parameter definitions that the FieldConfig uses.

prompt.desctiption: The user prompt for the AI, explaining what the AI should generate.
